name: Catherine: Japanese Edition
summary:
Japanese Edition
Famitsu DX Pack Limited Edition (Japan Only)

Includes game, artbook, Catherine Sound Disc CD, 3 A3-size posters (11.69in x 16.53in), arm rest cushion (2.75in x 4.72in) and 3 telephone cards. This was available as a limited edition for both the Xbox 360 and PS3 systems when the game launched in Japan.
